form.label: Security Command Center
form.description: Real-time Security Monitoring • Threat Detection • Authentication Analysis

search.query: index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | eval is_failed=if(match(_raw, "(?i)(failed|invalid|denied|error)"), 1, 0) | stats count as total_events, sum(is_failed) as failed_events | eval security_score=if(total_events>0, round(100-((failed_events/total_events)*100), 1), 100) | fillnull value=100 security_score

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) ("Failed password" OR "authentication failure" OR "Invalid user") | eval severity="high" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) ("Accepted password" OR "Accepted publickey" OR "session opened") | eval severity="low" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) "sudo" | eval severity="medium" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | rex field=_raw "from\s+(?<src_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | where isnotnull(src_ip) AND src_ip!="127.0.0.1" | stats dc(src_ip) as unique_ips | fillnull value=0

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | eval auth_status=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(failed|invalid|authentication failure)"), "Failed", match(_raw, "(?i)(accepted|session opened)"), "Success", 1=1, "Other" ) | timechart span=5m count by auth_status

panel.title: Brute Force Detection (5+ failures in 5 min)

search.query: index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) ("Failed password" OR "Invalid user") | eval severity="critical" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | rex field=_raw "from\s+(?<src_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | rex field=_raw "(?i)(failed password|invalid user)\s+for\s+(invalid user\s+)?(?<user>\S+)" | bucket _time span=5m | stats count as attempts, values(user) as targeted_users by _time, src_ip, host | where attempts >= 5 | sort -attempts | eval threat_level=case(attempts>=20,"Critical", attempts>=10,"High", attempts>=5,"Medium") | table _time, src_ip, host, attempts, targeted_users, threat_level | rename _time as "Time", src_ip as "Source IP", host as "Target Host", attempts as "Attempts", targeted_users as "Targeted Users", threat_level as "Threat Level"

panel.title: Top Failed Login Attempts by Source IP

search.query: index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) ("Failed password" OR "Invalid user") | eval severity="high" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | rex field=_raw "from\s+(?<src_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | stats count as failures by src_ip | sort -failures | head 15

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) ("Failed password" OR "Invalid user") | eval severity="high" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | rex field=_raw "(?i)(failed password|invalid user)\s+for\s+(invalid user\s+)?(?<user>\S+)" | stats count as attempts by user | sort -attempts | head 10

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) "sudo" | eval severity="medium" | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | rex field=_raw "sudo:\s+(?<user>\S+)\s+:\s+TTY=(?<tty>\S+)\s+;\s+PWD=(?<pwd>\S+)\s+;\s+USER=(?<target_user>\S+)\s+;\s+COMMAND=(?<command>.*)" | table _time, host, user, target_user, command | rename _time as "Time", host as "Host", user as "User", target_user as "As User", command as "Command" | head 50

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ (sourcetype=linux_secure OR sourcetype=syslog) | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | timechart span=10m count by host limit=10

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | stats count by sourcetype | sort -count

index=security host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | eval severity=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(brute|attack|exploit|intrusion|unauthorized)"), "critical", match(_raw, "(?i)(failed password|invalid user|authentication failure|denied)"), "high", match(_raw, "(?i)(sudo|session opened|session closed)"), "medium", 1=1, "low" ) | where severity="$severity_filter$" OR "$severity_filter$"="*" | head 100
